GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
media: tw686x: Register the irq at the end of probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit fef3261630ebf21aee44435ed6076c13bb3e0a36, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit 704a84ccdbf19fdce9adfda0b936dfdcac52fa49. For more details please see the references link.
